## TransformLike interface

The interface \[\[TransformLike\]\] is used to represent transforms with only translation and rotation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TransformLike 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [position](./harp-geoutils.transformlike.position.md) | [Vector3Like](./harp-geoutils.vector3like.md) | The position of this transform. |
|  [xAxis](./harp-geoutils.transformlike.xaxis.md) | [Vector3Like](./harp-geoutils.vector3like.md) | The x-axis of this transform. |
|  [yAxis](./harp-geoutils.transformlike.yaxis.md) | [Vector3Like](./harp-geoutils.vector3like.md) | The y-axis of this transform. |
|  [zAxis](./harp-geoutils.transformlike.zaxis.md) | [Vector3Like](./harp-geoutils.vector3like.md) | The z-axis of this transform. |
